text:
Created attachment 22766
Patch to set listen protocol name to "https" for port 443

According to the Listen doc at 
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mpm_common.html#listen,
when the protocol string is left off the Listen directive, the
default is "https" for port 443, and "http" for all other ports.

The actual behavior was to use "http" for all ports.  Here's a
patch to make the behavior match the documentation.
Committed to trunk and submitted for backporting to 2.2.x.
